name: SetValue

arguments.name: variable
arguments.desc: Name of number variable in the global context

examples: This will change the value of myValue from 0 to 1 in a linear fasion over 0.5 seconds
description: Set value of a number variable in the global context with an optional transition.
If a transition is provided the value will animate from current value to the new value during the transition time.
